permissions: Admins can update maintenance requirement rules. Managers who are members of a broker can update rules for their brokers. Operations members with manager business unit membership can update rules only when a business unit is specified and they belong to it. Operations members can update rules only when a business unit is specified and they belong to it.
validation_notes: Requires a maintenance requirement rule ID argument. At least one attribute or relationship must be provided. --broker cannot be empty when set. When provided, --rule must be non-empty. Setting --equipment, --equipment-classification, or --business-unit to an empty string clears that relationship. The server enforces that at least one scope (equipment, equipment classification, or business unit) remains present after update. --is-active is only applied when the flag is set.
